name: Terrashift Tactics - Online Multiplayer Turn Based Strategy
blurb: Online turn based strategy game with an emphasis on controlling the landscape to your advantage. With character customization and more!

rewards.reward: LIMITED EARLY VERSION OF \u00a38 REWARD  - Digital download of Terrashift Tactics for our early backers when the game is released
Digital download of Terrashift Tactics when the game is released
LIMITED EARLY VERSION OF \u00a310 REWARD - Digital download of Terrashift Tactics when the game is released and exclusive BETA access for our early backers
Digital download of Terrashift Tactics when the game is released and exclusive BETA access
Exclusive early character/environment concept art + soundtrack. Includes a digital download of Terrashift Tactics and the exclusive BETA

Get an AI profile named by you in Terrashift Tactics for everyone to play against! We can have a voice chat on Skype to discuss the name of your choice. Includes the character/environment art, the games soundtrack, and a digital download of Terrashift Tactics and the exclusive BETA
3x Digital download of Terrashift Tactics when the game is released
3x Digital download of Terrashift Tactics when the game is released and exclusive BETA access (All 3 copies)

3x Digital download of Terrashift Tactics when the game is released and exclusive BETA access (All 3 copies). Includes a digital copy of the character/environment artwork and the Terrashift Tactics soundtrack. Includes a exclusive "backers only" profile picture in game.

Create your own character! We can discuss all the details about their equipment, weapons and ability's on Skype in a design meeting together. 1x digital download of Terrashift Tactics with exclusive BETA access and a digital copy of the character/environment artwork and sound track to Terrashift Tactics. Includes a exclusive "backers only" profile picture in game.

Work with us to name a custom ability in game, talk with the team through Skype to discuss your ideas and thoughts, nothing like a good chat!  You also get 1x digital download of Terrashift Tactics with exclusive BETA access and a digital copy of the character/environment artwork and sound track to Terrashift Tactics. Includes a exclusive "backers only" profile picture in game.

Limited Edition T-shirt of Terrashift Tactics.\r\n3x Digital download of Terrashift Tactics when the game is released and exclusive BETA access (All 3 copies). Includes a digital copy of the character/environment artwork and the Terrashift Tactics soundtrack. Includes a exclusive "backers only" profile picture in game.

Our graphic artists will add a statue of you in the game! In one of the official maps there will be a custom statue of you for the world to see and admire! You also get 1x digital download of Terrashift Tactics with exclusive BETA access and a digital copy of the character/environment artwork and sound track to Terrashift Tactics. Includes a exclusive "backers only" profile picture in game.

Work with us to design your own pre-set squad of characters, each with their own equipment, weapons and ability's that appears in game for everyone. We can have a design meeting on Skype so we can hear your thoughts and ideas. You also get 1x digital download of Terrashift Tactics with exclusive BETA access and a digital copy of the character/environment artwork and sound track to Terrashift Tactics. Includes a exclusive "backers only" profile picture in game.

Design and create your own map that will be in the official Terrashift Tactics release! We will send you our custom built Level Editor for you to play with, and once you have made a map you are happy with, send it to us and if we like it, it gets in the game! You also get 1x digital download of Terrashift Tactics with exclusive BETA access and a digital copy of the character/environment artwork and sound track to Terrashift Tactics. Includes a exclusive "backers only" profile picture in game.

Have a meal and a drink on us! We can discuss the game, your ideas, and anything else you want to talk about. You also get 1x digital download of Terrashift Tactics with exclusive BETA access and a digital copy of the character/environment artwork and sound track to Terrashift Tactics. Includes a exclusive "backers only" profile picture in game. Travel costs are not included, you must make your own way here.

We will give you 10 digital downloads of Terrashift Tactics with exclusive BETA access. Plus you get to name an AI and ability, and create your own squad of characters. You also get a digital copy of the character/environment artwork and sound track. Includes a exclusive "backers only" profile picture in game.
